website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek a non-toxic, organic alternative to chlorine bleach, these inexpensive pods provide whitening and brightening power.
pros: Works especially well on color loads
Safe, organic alternative to chemical bleach
cons: Pods do not always dissolve completely
Not as effective as actual bleach on certain stains
Some report it has an unpleasant fish-like odor

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative!  These work!
customer_reviews.text: I have found these little nuggets to be the BEST cleaner for toilet bowls. I had some staining in one of my newer toilets due to the extremely low flush volume. I tried cleanser, CLR, toilet bowl cleaners, hand scrubbing.... yet the stain persisted though diminished. I had these for my laundry (which are great for brightening clothes without harsher chemicals) so I tried one in the toilet bowl. Voila! Stains are gone. This is now my go-to for bowl cleaning in my house. I like that they are an alternative to bleach and better for the environment. And they work! You can use them to soak whites for a while to brighten them even more. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: severe allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: My partner had a severe allergic reaction to this product. He had a rash and itching all over from it, necessitating a trip to urgent care and some prescription antihistamines. It took a couple of months of trial and error with different detergents before we narrowed it down to these pods. I realize that this is an unusual reaction to something that's fragrance free and supposedly hypoallergenic but there's something in it that he's allergic to. We haven't had this problem with name-brand OxyClean, even the stuff with the fragrance. It's well past the time to return it so I'll end up finding someone to give it to.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy Results
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give less than Sterling reviews of any product designed to help the environment. Unfortunately in cold water, which I use almost exclusively, the powder packets don't full dissolve leaving clumps of powder on the fabrics washed.
customer_reviews.author: David A Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Turned wash green
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Look at the picture of identical dish clothes. The one with the green hue is the one we used this product on. The entire white wash came out with this greenish tint. So sorry I bought this. Have only used one pod, hope they let me return it for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works best in warmer water
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work like traditional bleach in that it is best used in warmer water for dissolving and activating. It also appears to be gentler on linens. We've been happy and would recommend the product as long as the user understands that it needs a little warm water to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne K

customer_reviews.title: turns stains green
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of a bleach alternative, but... on first use I noticed that my whites weren't as clean. Then on second and third use, some stains turned green. So, not only does it not work as a bleach, it actually made some stains worse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knapton

customer_reviews.title: Yes! In every load to whiten/brighten!
customer_reviews.text: Using these along with detergent in every load- perfection! Whites are brighter, some old stains lifted, helped take the dog smell out of pet bedding! They feel and snell sanitized. Use 1 pod for a light load and 2 for heavier loads like towels. The biggest surprise is how soft my towels are! It’s a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kelammo

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bleach alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a couple of years now and they are the best bleach alternative I've found. I put a pod or two, depending on the load size, in every load and everything comes out great. I don't have a problem with them not dissolving in my front loading washer like I did with a different brand. I've not noticed a scent with them either. Highly recommend for those looking to use green products.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these pod twice hoping the first ineffective batch was a fluke. Most of the pods ruptured in the second package resulting in a powdery mess. Will not purchase a third time. Oxyclean is a more practical and effective alternative.
customer_reviews.author: mrsupport

customer_reviews.title: this works and no chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something without chemicals and hoped they worked. They do and this is all I use now. Auto ship is a really great feature and less money. I use these pretty much for every load. No blead and discoloring of clothes. No scent either which is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be really good! Definitely love that these are cruelty free and that they don't have toxic chemicals in them. The packaging is what you would expect. I purchased this because I wanted to make sure that my bed sheets were kept very clean without the use of harmful chemicals. I will update this in the future it to let you know if it has any kind of an effect on my sheets which are 1200 count cotton. Hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well.
customer_reviews.text: It's not as strong on stain removal as chlorine bleach but since I'm avoiding regular bleach, this is a reasonable substitute. It will even work on toilet stains. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: P. Robles

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have a sensitivity to chemical smells and would prefer a natural option but I also want my whites nice and bright. This product checked all the boxes. The only complaint I have is the product packaging. The recycle ♻️ code 7 is considered the poorest for effective recycling. Since the pods are sealed in individual dissolvable nuggets, perhaps a paper based packaging could be explored. In my opinion that would make this product a perfect 5 ⭐️. Thanks for listening.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Toste

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this via a different site. I liked it and decided I would try a whole bag. Well, I won’t be buying anymore. Several of the pods were open and the powder was in the bag. Today I discovered that the pods only dissolve *some* of the time.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyIsAnimate

customer_reviews.title: Can't get clorox? Try this
customer_reviews.text: Because of covid-19 I had been unable to get clorox either on line or at local stores. Tried this not expecting good results for bleaching white undershirts but was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Dyanne Garvin

customer_reviews.title: No bleach splashes
customer_reviews.text: I first found the bleach pods in the grocery store and I loved them. So convenient and no splash stains from pouring the bleach. This is a different brand than I typically use but I found it to be just as goid, if not better, than what I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowers4D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Grab Green Natural Bleach Alternative Pods Unscented for the second time. I love the fact that there is no bleach smell and you just have to throw the pod in the washer and that's it. SOOO easy. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Is not effective, wouldn't buy again...
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks! I washed white towels twice, followed the instructions and there were no indications that it even bleaches stains, let alone brightens whites! So dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These pods are easy to use at the laundromat. Easy to carry, and I only need to take what I need. It also is just oxygen bleach without a bunch of needless ingredients like perfume.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. di Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: I love this Bleach
customer_reviews.text: No Odor. So easy to use—only two Pods are needed for a large load of towels. The only brand I use since my purchase of the front load washer some six years ago.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieK

customer_reviews.title: Going back to good old liquid bleach
customer_reviews.text: This leaves an awful smell. My daughter couldn't get to sleep as her sheets smelled so bad. This product also doesn't clean stains very well. My brand-new white kitchen towels that mopped up chocolate milk spills showed ghost stains after washing. I went back to my usual combination of Arm & Hammer Oxy Clean Powdered Detergent with an added cup of regular liquid bleach. It was only then that I was able to get the stains out again. At least I tried this product out. I was curious to see if it would save me the hassle of pouring bleach into my white loads.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppie Doll

customer_reviews.title: Stained my clothes
customer_reviews.text: Theses pods do not dissolve well in my HE washer. I tried putting them at the bottom of the load which didn’t help, as well as dropping them on top. Even in hot water cycle they did not dissolve completely which caused staining on my white towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Since covid19 I had trouble finding bleach. Found this product. Easy to use. Light to Carry. I can disolve in a spray bottle for doornobs
customer_reviews.author: janet z.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s works well and is a good value considering bleach is extremely hard to buy these day.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Blayton

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this product. My whites are beautiful again. So easy to use. A little pricey, but still happy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Green product
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for more green brands. Trying to incorporate green living into as many aspects of my life as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kraz

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work well and they didn't fall apart in transit like another brand I used to get. They completely dissolve and leave no odor.
customer_reviews.author: inner city teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used bleach in a long time because I hate the harshness of the chemical. Found this product and it works great. Every thing is nice and bright. Takes out stains and even works on colored clothes! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other bleach products this is the one to choose. Quality and packaging are great. Easy to use and truly does take stains out of white clothes. I would highly recommend this to others versus buying a giant plastic container of bleach alone. Go Green!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Swan

customer_reviews.title: Amazed - get this product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THIS PRODUCT! ORDERED MORE. I almost through out some towels but used this product on them and WOW! All the stains disappeared..
customer_reviews.author: Aldamel3

customer_reviews.title: Failure to Release
customer_reviews.text: The casing does not release the product properly. At the end of the wash there are white powder granules still undissolved. This last wash I cut the casing to aid the release. Maybe the problem is that I wash clothes in cold water. Maybe this product is geared for hot. I used the pods so I don't have to mess with a liquid. This product is not useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: junojupiter

customer_reviews.title: I am in love.
customer_reviews.text: I put this product in all my washables except dark clothing. It is the best for taking out stains. Even old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J

customer_reviews.title: works good, but wish they would ditch the plastic, so not buying anymore
customer_reviews.text: love the product, hate the packaging, so if they switch to paper packaging will buy again, just trying to helps eliminate plastic where I can
customer_reviews.author: TNT Townley

customer_reviews.title: Bright White & Safe
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned my whites really well, without harsh feel to the fabric. Very glad it's safe for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cool

customer_reviews.title: Good bleach alternative
customer_reviews.text: Grateful to fond bleach alternative. The pods simplify use. Folllw recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with the boosting power
customer_reviews.text: If I feel like my load is going to require a little more cleaning power than what my pod provides, I tossed one of these in and everything comes out a little cleaner. I would buy these again
customer_reviews.author: stargazer11

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This is useless. Tried it three time and it does absolutely nothing. It may be natural but it serves no purpose when cleaning whites. Total waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Does not dissolve in HE washer
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT DISSOLVE. Left white powder all over my sheets. Had to rewash. Too late for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Custer

customer_reviews.title: No hole bleach
customer_reviews.text: I love the grab green products and the non-chlorine bleach is awesome. It made my husbands nylon running shoes truly white again. The pods prevent any spilling. If I have really tough stains I throw two in the washer rather than risking bleach 'eating a hole' in the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: CarynNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great stain remover
customer_reviews.text: It gets the stains out and it is biodegradable,very happy.
customer_reviews.author: isabel w padilla

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: New packaging needed plastic is not an environmentally friendly source.
customer_reviews.author: Ivona Williams

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer.
customer_reviews.text: I do not know this product, maybe later I can opined about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Choy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Gets rid of the sour smell in my husbands sweaty shirts no problem! All of our laundry smells super clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and it’s a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: An essential for getting laundry whites white at my house. Note the size! This is a much bigger package than what I see on offer at my local grocery store but the price is similar. Very happy to have found this bargain
customer_reviews.author: BillyH

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a small to medium load of white clothes weekly and do not want to use bleach on the regular. These pods were a pleasant surprise! They work quite well. I pop one pod into my front loading washer then add the clothes and detergent. They come out very white!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thuringer

customer_reviews.title: Saved me money on a new lab coat
customer_reviews.text: My lab coat had been turned pink from the wash, I managed to reverse it with these added to my normal tide pods.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for Clorox 2
customer_reviews.text: What a great alternative to Clorox 2. Easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.author: MamaLatima

customer_reviews.title: Useless expensive garbage
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. JAbsolute garbage, doesn’t work at all. It’s completely useless. and some pods were busted, was messy...
customer_reviews.author: Sean k

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The pods are great. They dissolve in washer immediately. Convenient & no mess.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this left bleach spots on my clothers. I threw it away!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of the bleach without harmful chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: BPC.

customer_reviews.title: Clean and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These help a lot when you have a teenager learning how to wash clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Mookie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this chlorine-free bleach to wash my bike bibs and custom Jersey with.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Allen Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Best bleach alternative I have ever used. Also a plus is being non scented. I don't like the bleach scent, it's too strong. I'm very sensitive to scents.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Vilato-Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I like these very much and I continue to order them. There is no fragrance, which is lovely. Does an outstanding job of cleaning without damaging clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Carlyene Hayden

customer_reviews.title: All Natural and It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I ordered these about whether or not it would really brighten like bleach, I could tell the difference on the first load I washed with one. I've used it on my whites and colors and I am very pleased with the results. I'm so happy I found a great bleach alternative that is all natural, odor free and septic safe!
customer_reviews.author: HeRos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic job product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results. We have a high concentration of iron in our water. No matter what we have tried our whites and light colored clothes eventually yellow and become grungy. With consistent use our clothes are becoming white again. We can see the difference each laundry day as the yellow grungy look fades. Much better than buying new clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I always used a small amount of bleach to get the smell out of towels but these work just as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on mixed colors.
customer_reviews.text: First time using this type of product. It does pretty good on white but GREAT on mixed colors.
customer_reviews.author: Darla DeWalt

customer_reviews.title: Grab Green Bleach Bleach Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product removes soil and stains from my laundry without the use of harmful chemicals. There is a considerable, noticeable brightness, cleanliness and freshness when the laundry is finished. It does seem to have slight urine odor which dispels itself when washing detergent is added to the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great whitener for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - much cheaper than Oxi, and does a good job at whitening whites. I really do not care about "brightening" colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinin

customer_reviews.title: this is the best product i have used in a long time
customer_reviews.text: this is the best product i have used in a long time..non chlorine bleach is almost impossible to find on the market..this is great.
customer_reviews.author: frances callahan

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover/whitener
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product for removing stains from any color or kind of clothing (no fading after several years of use), and the best whitener, that I have found in decades. It is especially good for organic stains like blood, food, horse stable crud.
customer_reviews.author: E. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the product. It did not work. I even repeated the steps and resoaked my clothing in a sink for 6 hours. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get out stains.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for keeping whites a bit brighter than not using at all. But it can't remove stains from whites like real bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Great pods for fresh laundry
customer_reviews.text: I love these bleach alternative pods. They seem to keep my front loading machine and my laundry smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: TheVintageVegan

customer_reviews.title: My laundry smells good and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive about this product at first. It works! My laundry smells good and it looks good
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Bleach alternative pods work!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bleach alternative pods! These are my favorite pods, as they are kinder to the environment and your body. They work well when dissolved in the sink for spot treatments and work efficiently in the laundry too.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Newton

customer_reviews.title: These pods = ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bleach alternative pods! I use two pods per load of whites, and even my older white t-shirts come out nice and bright. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is natural.. Really did not make a difference to our clothes
customer_reviews.author: Diana M

customer_reviews.title: Helps boost my whites
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I'm deployed so I don't get to wash my clothes myself. The exact laundry procedure is a mystery to me so keep that in mind. I do know that my socks often came back grey or tan before and now that I sneak one of these babies into every load, my socks are quite a bit closer to white. Even the older socks that were getting dingy are slowly getting a little whiter. My colors I can't really speak for because the water here is treated with heavy chemicals so I can't make any fair observations. I highly doubt these were intended to combat harsh water treatments and mystery chemicals, but they do alright by me.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty&Brains

customer_reviews.title: safe product
customer_reviews.text: brighter whites & light colored clothing without the danger of chlorine
customer_reviews.author: oneofGod'skids

customer_reviews.title: Cleans pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Cleans pretty well and safe to use on color fabrics
customer_reviews.author: Cen

customer_reviews.title: But I'm very pleased with this product I will buy it again and
customer_reviews.text: was looking for a non-toxic bleach. And I was skeptical at first. But I'm very pleased with this product I will buy it again and again
customer_reviews.author: Marla Barr

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I am not so sensitive but I really can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am not so sensitive but I really can't tell the difference from not using this....I might stop using it after this order.
customer_reviews.author: WaikikiMilla85

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it seeing all these good reviews but I was not very satisfied with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Its okay, it doesnt get those stains off. I purchased it seeing all these good reviews but I was not very satisfied with the product to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: hms22

customer_reviews.title: Leave a smaller Eco-footprint & still have beautiful clothes
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent product! Works as well as oxyclean! Non chlorine so even my colors are brighter
customer_reviews.author: Raime

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these because they (and the company's other products) have an excellent rating. Sadly
customer_reviews.text: After reading the ratings for bleach alternatives on the EWG, I was horrified...but, not surprised. The toxic chemicals allowed to be used in everyday products is scary. That said, I ordered these because they (and the company's other products) have an excellent rating. Sadly, these don't work well for my family's whites, even with pre-soaking and adding 2 packets out of agrivation. I use Green Shield organic laundry liquid and highly recommend it. I have gone back to making my own non-bleach whitening powder mixture. You can Google search for recipes. Most of them work much better than these pods.
customer_reviews.author: Write4U

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think it works better than Clorox. I like that its not a liquid, no spills.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Houser

customer_reviews.title: Bleachy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and doesn’t make ur hands smell like bleach. Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Great
customer_reviews.text: I love how the bleach alternative really gets my whites clean.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Skibicki

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: quick and easy and no chlorine. seems to work great with my clothes
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fabulous bleach alternative - natural ingredients no chemical residues no perfumes
customer_reviews.author: Lhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Really works to make clothes whiter
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. At this time Amazon has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrific! Get rid of the bleaches and Iron-out.
customer_reviews.author: horn 1

customer_reviews.title: White Clothes are white
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with my soap nuts in a front loading washer for the white socks I wear without shoes. Since I walk outside quite a bit, my socks get pretty dirty. They come out of the laundry clean and white. I have also gotten strawberry stains out of a white shirt without any pretreating.
customer_reviews.author: EMN

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t actually remove stains
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t do much for my stains, unfortunately. Even when I followed instructions to soak for a couple hours!
customer_reviews.author: Tingting

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: does not do a good job will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: David J.Turner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t dissolve well after laundering. The remaining remnant pod does dissolve after placing it under warm water and utilizing a scrubbing motion. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and clean- happy consumer.
customer_reviews.text: Good at cleaning and whitening. Love the small packs. Great product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: A very nice 'Green' version of 'Oxyclean
customer_reviews.text: Good price, delivered when needed in my reoccurring purchases order. I don't even have to think about it.
customer_reviews.author: PlantCrone

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, and I'm glad I don't have to use bleach anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with my normal detergent and a tiny bit of fabric softener. It works just as well as bleach, so that makes me happy. I usually use 2 pods per load that I dissolve in hot water prior to adding to the washer, and I also soak my whites for a little while during the wash. I have a white quilt that had some color rubbed onto it from some burgundy sheets. This stuff washed the color stains right out of the quilt on the first wash. I don't know if normal detergent without these pods would have worked, but this worked, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tisus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have left bleach completely and love the whitening of this product, Also a great brightener for colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Melissa G. Brickey

customer_reviews.title: I feel better about it
customer_reviews.text: I think I can tell a difference. Regardless, I feel better about it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality bleach. One is enough for a medium load
customer_reviews.author: muthu1980

customer_reviews.title: Oxygen Bleach pacs
customer_reviews.text: Works very well but need two pacs for large loads
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love this product. great on whites and great against stains
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good organic bleach alternative.
customer_reviews.text: I like these organic bleach alternative pods. Use one with your organic detergent for the whites, and I believe it's as effective as most bleaches. I'd recommend to give these a try with your laundry. In small ways I try to be kind to our planet and my family.
customer_reviews.author: UTblue

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these a 2 because I'm going to keep trying, but in my first 2 uses, I took my laundry out and .. plunk.. a large white chunk fell on the floor. It didn't dissolve! The plastic did, and it was a smaller lump than originally, but it didn't fully dissolve. Laundry didn't smell clean so I rewashed it using the Tide clear pods. My husband suggested squeezing these pods to break them up beforehand so I will try that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This has gotten some bad stains out in the first wash. I have three kids 5 and under and this works great for us! I really like that it is green as well.
customer_reviews.author: brobertson

product_meta.title: Grab Green Natural Bleach Alternative Pods, Unscented/Free & Clear, 60 Loads, Non-Chlorine Bleach, Fragrance Free
product_meta.description: Size:60 Count (Pack of 1)| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingUse 1 pod for small to midium loads Use 2 pods for large to extra large loads Add-in laundry booster directions Grab & toss pod(s) into washer drum or powder detergent dispenser Add Clothing Reseal pouch for freshness For tough stains pre-soak clothes for tough dried-in stains: 1 pod for sink full of water. Toss pod into water and mix until dissolved. Place in clothes and let items soak for 1 to 6 hours. Wash as usual using Grab Green 3 in 1 laundry detergent pods and bleach alternative pods.
feature_bullets: Naturally-Derived Ingredients, Non-Toxic Formula, Add-in Laundry booster to Brighten Whites, Effortlessly Removes Stains
Neutralizes Odors, Fragrance Free and Hypoallergenic, Works for all Temperatures,Safe on Colors
